desc: Kang ski poles come in flax carbon composite, bamboo and telescopic aluminum for men and women suitable for all mountain, alpine touring, backcountry, freeride, off piste, park and powder skiing. All ski sticks come in green, orange, black, blue, grey, red in size 105 cm, 110 cm, 115 cm, 120 cm, 125 cm, 130 cm, 135 cm.

layout.text: 30% of the revenue from direct sales goes to Protect Our Winters
